entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 5:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: WSW 46 km/h gust 72 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Ontario. Local amount 15 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 110. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Ontario. Blowing snow. Local amount 15 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
